description: An egg belonging to a wasp.  Feels slick and coarse.

name: wasp glue
description: Glue made from a wasps saliva, some plant material, and whatever they've eaten.  Makes a fairly weak glue, but can be dried and processed into an adhesive with some effort.

name: wasp adhesive
description: Glue mixed with acid water and dried after being mixed with nitrates to firm it up.  Makes a strong glue that is capable of a wide range of uses.
